Welcome to QuickBooks Point of Sale powered by Revel Systems and Thank You for your Purchase!
What to expect during your Onboarding Experience
DocuSign completed – Payment Received (24 hours) Welcome Email is sent automatically
· Complete the onboarding form (attached)
3. (2-4 business days) Back office Management URL is Deployed
· You will receive an email providing you with your Revel URL and login information.
4. (2-5 business days) Hardware is Shipped
· Your equipment can be ready to ship (you will receive a tracking number for your shipment. If you have not received your tracking number by day 5 please let me know)
5. (5-7 business days) 1st Onboarding Call
· Onboarding will reach out with check-lists and templates (expect a phone call and/or email within this time frame. If you do not receive a call by day 7, please let me know.
Note: Once an onboarding agent reaches out to you, that rep is assigned to your account. They will be your Point of Contact for the duration of your onboarding experience.
6. Additional Onboarding Calls
· Number of calls and duration will vary depending on your business, which will vary from 2-6 interactions and will be scheduled as necessary.
7. CSM Services
· Will be scheduled based on package purchased.
